mapper.sql: select id, userId, userName, cashBalance, rechargeNumber, freezeBalance, accountBalance, sumDealAmount, sumRechargeAmount, sumProfit, sumAgentProfit, sumOrderCount, todayDealAmount, todayProfit, todayOrderCount, todayAgentProfit, userType, agent, isAgent,sumWitAmount,todayWitAmount, createTime, submitTime, status, version , currency , quota ,todayOtherWitAmount from alipay_user_fund

select id, userId, userName, cashBalance, rechargeNumber, freezeBalance, accountBalance, sumDealAmount, sumRechargeAmount, sumProfit, sumAgentProfit, sumOrderCount, todayDealAmount, todayProfit, todayOrderCount, todayAgentProfit, userType, agent, isAgent,sumWitAmount,todayWitAmount, createTime, submitTime ,todayOtherWitAmount from alipay_user_fund_Bak
mapper.insert:
insert into alipay_user_fund
userId, userName, cashBalance, rechargeNumber, freezeBalance, accountBalance, sumDealAmount, sumRechargeAmount, sumProfit, sumAgentProfit, sumOrderCount, todayDealAmount, todayProfit, todayOrderCount, todayAgentProfit, userType, agent, isAgent, createTime, submitTime, status, version, currency,
#{userId}, #{userName}, #{cashBalance}, #{rechargeNumber}, #{freezeBalance}, #{accountBalance}, #{sumDealAmount}, #{sumRechargeAmount}, #{sumProfit}, #{sumAgentProfit}, #{sumOrderCount}, #{todayDealAmount}, #{todayProfit}, #{todayOrderCount}, #{todayAgentProfit}, #{userType}, #{agent}, #{isAgent}, #{createTime}, #{submitTime}, #{status}, #{version}, #{currency},
